section.heading: Property subject to liens.
section.text: When an infant is entitled to real or personal estate in the District of Columbia which is liable to a mortgage, trust, or lien, or is in any way charged with the payment of money, the court may decree in the case as if the infant were of full age.

annotations.annotation: Mortgages, rights of infants, see §§ 42-808 and 42-809.
